name: Order Up! (Alessia Ianni-Palarchio, Dracomora)
description:
Can't decide on what to eat? This game's for you!

Order Up! is a  playful intervention to make ordering new food fun and easy.

Included in the download are four phone-sized rules sheet:

  • Rules to use with your friends in person!
  • Rules to use with your friends online!
  • An optional scorecard!
  • An optional power-ups card!

Comments about the food you've ordered (and food pics) are always appreciated  and very welcome!
